title: How do I configure the weather settings?
answer:
On the home screen, go to Widget. Touch Weather to access it. 

 On the screen, flick your finger left or right to view the weather of different cities. 

 To update the weather information, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111154) in the lower left corner. 

 To manage cities, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111155) in the lower right corner. You can then add or delete a city or set the current location. 

 To configure other weather settings, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111156) in the lower right corner on the same screen. You can then set the temperature unit, and whether tones, auto update, and update interval are displayed.
